channel.title: debug-me: secure and trusted remote debugging
channel.description:
debug-me allows remote debugging by a third party while assuring the owner about the integrity of their systems and informing them what was done. The session log is cryptographically signed and can be replayed.
http://joeyh.name/blog/entry/announcing_debug-me/ https://debug-me.branchable.com/
